item.description:
Our montly potluck dinner and business meeting will be at Kevin's home in Ellington.

A very important meeting! Since the December meeting was cancelled, we need to elect officers for 2010, choose a scholarship chair and committee, and make plans for an anniversary celebration in February.

Please come with your ideas for fun things you'd like to do in the coming months and a dish to share! Please post what you will be bringing to help ensure a well-rounded menu.

Because this event is in a private home, you must RSVP to get directions.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
